GSD.description:
net/sunrpc: fix reference count leaks in rpc_sysfs_xprt_state_change

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.24 by commit 4b22aa42bd4d2d630ef1854c139275c3532937cb. For more details please see the references link.
